DICTIONARY
OF THE

OLD ENGLISH LANGUAGE,
COMPILED FROM WRITINGS

OF THE XII. XIII. XIV. AND XV. CENTURIES,

BY
/

FRANCIS HENRY STRATMANN.

SECOND EDITION.

PRINTED FOR THE AUTHOR AT
KREFELD.

LONDON
TRUBNER & CO., 57 & 59, LUDGATE HILL
1873.

ADVERTISEMENT.
The present edition of the Dictionary of the Old English language has not only been revised and enlarged, but written anew
from one end to the other,

so that there will

in which the amending hand is not visible.

students.

and the Rev. W. W. Skeat.

KREFELD, 20th January 1873.
